name: Rugby Se7ens 22
description:
This is a semi-simulation rugby 7s live action game in the Retro style, 2D top down format. Each player has a unique make up of attributes that determines how they perform on field. Each player(AI Included) has build in decision making to ensure a human element to each scenario. 

The career mode starts with only handful money to build your starting team. Earn money by defeating the CPU opponents to earn money for better players to add to the squad. Each higher tier rewarding more money for wining and scoring tries.

The gameplay is fluent and full of action, true to the rugby experience. 

KEYS:

W: Kick

E: Pass Right, SHIFT E : Skip Pass Right

Q: Pass Left, SHIFT Q: Skip Pass Left

A:Ruck, Lineout(for CPU As Well)

S: Sidestep(when S prompt is shown), Score Try.
